Black Mountain Resources Hub


Mission Statement:

The Black Mountain Volunteer Corps is a community led coalition dedicated to supporting volunteer initiatives, programs and actions of community service in the wake of Hurricane Helene.


Community Resources Lists (Recursos Publicos):
Black Mountain and Swannanoa


Last Updated: 20 October 2024


Town of Black Mountain


Organizations and individuals can use the following form to request supplies:

Supply Request Form


Sites participating in the Black Mountain Relief hub can use the following form to report supply shortages and surpluses:

Supply Status Form
